input: Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: Liking spicy food has a direct effect on room. The candle has a direct effect on room. Method 1: We look at how liking spicy food correlates with room case by case according to the candle. Method 2: We look directly at how liking spicy food correlates with room in general. To understand how liking spicy food affects room, is it more correct to use the Method 1 than Method 2?
